name: Mushroom Labyrinth (Squidly Games)
description:
An ambient first person collecting game, where you track down mushrooms in a labyrinthine cave system, in search of the ultimate abyssal fungi. 

Controls:

[W, A, S, D] - movement 

[E] or [LMB CLICK] - collect mushroom, activate doors

[SPACE] - jump (and double jump)

[SHIFT] - sprint 

[C] - crouch

[R] - restart at checkpoint

[P] or [ESC] - pause

~

Made for AGBIC 2022 

To theme, there are   of mushrooms.
